text: “Ndipo (iwe Mneneri) akakudzera (awo osauka) amene akhulupirira zizindikiro zathu (atalakwa pang’ono), auze: “Mtendere ukhale pa inu. Mbuye wanu wadzikakamiza kukhala Wachifundo, kuti mwa inu amene achite choipa mwaumbuli, koma pambuyo pake nkulapa, nachita zabwino, Allah amkhululukira; Iye Ngokhululuka kwambiri, Ngwachisoni chosatha.”
